page.title: 01Weston and the local Area
page.content:
This locality is an area of attractive countryside bordering the Cotswolds. The{landscape}is mainly farmland with patches of woodland. Weston is the only sizeable{settlement}in the area. The countryside provides a natural habitat for many species of{wildlife. The human{population}of the area is estimated to be not more than 500.
Despite its situation on the main A43 {Weston}is a pretty village with numerous buildings of historical and architectural interest. It is well endowed with amenities and has a variety of well supported clubs.
The community of Weston comprises old established families and newcomers. Though some commute to work,{farming, {trade, tourism and rural industries provide considerable local{employment.
